movie-description: Horror movie about a demented professor of the occult, whose soul jumps into the curvaceous body of Nurse Sherri (Jill Jacobson) shortly before he dies on the operating table. The possessed lady in white then begins stalking, seducing and kill people - even her boyfriend - until someone puts an end to the madness.
movie-short-description: Directed by Al Adamson.  With Geoffrey Land, Jill Jacobson, Marilyn Joi, Katherine Pass. A hospital nurse is possessed by an evil spirit, and proceeds to kill off the hospital's patients.
